channel.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
channel.description:
#### Was playing alchemist. I visited the target with heal and was swapped to myself. At the same time I was prevented from using ability. At the same time I was immune to occupation. All this was all at once night one. #### I had to be just occupied. I think?
#### Steps to reproduce: We need a CW, Alch, Butler (and Merc/sellsword I think)? Alch visits CW that swaped himself with an alch. Butler occupies Alch and Merc/Sellsword guards an Alch.
#### Comments: ![what|690x387](upload://ukXtAIQGCLY9HtSKAQvttBTQguD.jpg)

item.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
This seems like the Butler and Drunk interaction, though I think this is more likely to be Sellsword considering the order.

Upon being occupied, you cannot be Debbed.

First thing that happened: CW swapped your target to yourself
Second: Sellsword occupied you.
Third: Drunk tried to deb you

This should not be a bug I think.
(Unless ofc; the game did not have any invokers/drunks)

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Maybe you were redirected to yourself then occupied but then somehow CW barriered? Idk tbh

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
item.dc:creator: Rikatto
item.description:
I have thought about this as well but that was night one. Next night I was debbed and it was successfull. Finaly, night 3 I was immune as well, but a message about immunity has appeared AFTER someone tried to occupy me.

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
I think you were redirected to yourself then occupied then redirected one last time giving you immunity to occupation/target change/jail

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Occupation + Swap bug
item.dc:creator: Rikatto
item.description:
Was playing alchemist. I visited the target with heal and was swapped to myself. At the same time I was prevented from using ability. At the same time I was immune to occupation. All this was all at once night one.

I had to be just occupied. I think?

Steps to reproduce: We need a CW, Alch, Butler (and Merc/sellsword I think)? Alch visits CW that swaped himself with an alch. Butler occupies Alch and Merc/Sellsword guards an Alch.
